hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim, from his father that the Prophet said:"Whoever buys a date-palm tree after it has been pollinated, its fruits belong to the seller, unless the purchaser has stipulated otherwise. And whoever buys a slave who has wealth, his wealth belongs to the seller, unless the purchaser has stipulated otherwise. "(sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْعَبْدِ يُبَاعُ وَيَسْتَثْنِي الْمُشْتَرِي مَالَهُ
chapter.eng-name: When A Slave Is Bought Or sold But His Possessions Are Exempt
